unnormalised: Borem, konnem tari kurtaak zai ti yogya mapanchi vicharle? Tem tumi vicharta tea porim sade na, bhai! Tumkam thoddeo vostu zai poddtteleo. Poilem, eka borem mapanchem fiti ghe, je dorje vapurtat, donui inch ani cm (centimeter) hantun aslelem. Sadem ruler vaprunk prayatn korunk naka; tumchea lagim nimanneak ek vaeit vostu zatel, LOL. Tumkam chest mapunk poddttelem (sogleant bhorlelea bhagachi bhovtonni), shoulder width (eka shoulder point thavn dusrea point meren - sadharonponni medium sizeak 18 inches astat), ani kurta chi lambai (shoulder thavn tumkam kuxin sampunk zai thoim meren - bodiek 42 inches?).
normalised: Okay, tor konnen tor ek kurta khatir barobar mapanchi vicharnni keli? Tem tumi vicharta titlen sope na, bhai! Tumkam thoddim vostunanchi goroz asa. Poilem, ek borem mapachi patti ghe, jem tailor vapurta, inch ani centimeter donuyen dakhovlelem. Sadharan scale vaprunk prayatn kor naka; tumchea hatant ek bhayanak parinnam yetolo, L-O-L. Tumkam chest (soglleant bhorlele bhagacherun), shoulder width (eka shoulder point-an thaun dusrea shoulder point-ak – sadharanponn medium size khatir athra inches astat) ani kurta length (shoulder-an thaun tumkam kiteak zai thoim – bodhaktalis inches?) mapunk poddttolem.

unnormalised: Dusre vatten: sleeves! Tumchea shoulder point thavn tumchea wrist bone meren mapun ghe. Choddxe zonn 24 inches full sleeve khatir zata, punn tem tumchea hathanchi lambai koxem asa tache voir adharit asta, spoxtt rupant. Tech porim, "gera" (tollek aslolem width) vicharun ghe. Hem style koxem asa tache voir adharit asta, punn sadharonponni 44 inches surakshit asat ek sust fit khatir. Pro Tip: Sodanch 1/2 inch te 1 inch extra soddun di soglea mapank seam allowance khatir. Mhojem aik, tum mhaka uprant dhanyavad ditole. Ani gollo kitlo asa tem visrunk naka - sadharonponni 15 inches te 16 inches.
normalised: Dusrem: sleeves! Tumchea shoulder point-an thaun tumchea wrist bone poriant map. Zaite zann full sleeve khatir chovis inches dortal, punn tem tumchea arm length-acher avalambun asa, obvyes. Ani, "gera" (talleak sanddlolea rundaai) vixim dhyan di. Hem style-acher avalambun asa, punn sadharanponn chovtalis inches ek aramdayak fit khatir surakshit mantat. Pro Tip: Seam allowance khatir sodanch half inch thaun ek inch extra ghala. Mazo visvas dhora, tum mhaka uprant dhanyavad ditole. Ani neck size visrunk naka - sadharanponn pandhra inches thaun solla inches astat.

unnormalised: Nimannem, ugddas dovortat him fokot margodxak totvam asat! Sogleant borem kortole zalear tumi eka kurta mapun gheum yeta je tumkam borem fit zata. Tem eka table voir sopat ghal ani soglim mapam tezatlean ghe. Tea parim, tumkam borem fit mellteleachi khatri asta. Aur haan, tum dorjikodden xivunk ditole zalear spoxtt rupant sanga tum inchant vo cm hantun mapam ditat mhonn. Thodi goddbod zalear ek vhodd fott zalear poddtta! Dev borem korum, ani khuxi zalo xivun!
normalised: Nimannem, him fakt margdarshanam mhunn ugddas dovra! Tumkam je kurta borem fit zata tem mapun ghevnuch bore. Tem tableacher ubem dovor ani tanthun soglle map ghevn ghe. Tenna, tumka borem fit miltolem mhunnachi garanti asta. Aur haan, zoxem tum tailor-an stich korunk ditai, tum inchesan diytale vo centimeteran tea vixim spasht sanga. Thoddo gandoll zalear ek vhoddlem chuken parinnam zata! Subh chintnam, ani khushal stiching!
